## Source: ossf-package-analysis (96cbe81d68d4bf1046012598de37b5dcef6f28b3ce01653ab29b3405b359d30e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@cat-ecom/pcc-components' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
